name: Dori Night - introduction
description:
Horror game. Prop first horror i've ever made. Don't think it's interesting but will see. Special for coppercube horror jam.

Pancakes

To make batter you need the following:

  • - 1 cup of flour
  • - 1 teaspoon of baking powder
  • - 2 eggs
  • - ½ teaspoon of salt
  • -  2 tablespoons of sugar
  • - 1 cup of milk
  • - 1 tablespoon of cooking oil
  • 1) Combine and mix all the ingredients well in a large bowl.
  • 2) Spoon the batter onto the hot frying pan; cook on both sides until golden brown.
  • 3) Serve the pancakes with honey or jam.
